attributes.action: Move education online during increased cases of COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Help stop the spread, help protect teaching/support staff & their families from COVID-19.
attributes.background: Schools/colleges to move education classes to online learning when there are increases in COVID-19 cases/new strains increasing rates. Applicable for tier 3 & tier 4 areas.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065

Reclose schools for students aged 13 and above
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557259

Close schools in Tier 4 areas
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564209

Close schools and colleges in areas under tier 4
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564318

Close schools in areas of tier 3
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563445

Close all schools until after February half-term to stop the spread of Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564640
